We help hospitality teams share tips with clarity and confidence.

Gratly is built for restaurants that want a faster, fairer way to track tips, pay out shifts, and keep every teammate aligned. We focus on the practical moments that make service feel smooth: easy close-outs, visible breakdowns, and clean reporting for managers.

What we stand for

Transparent pay, simple workflows, and people-first operations. We believe better tools create calmer shifts and more trusted teams.

Our mission

Turn tip distribution into a clear, reliable routine so operators can focus on hospitality and teams can focus on guests.

Clarity at close-out

Make every payout traceable, with no surprises at the end of the night.

Speed for managers

Automate the math and move money faster so teams trust the process.

Trust for staff

Give every teammate visibility into what they earned and why.

Our story

Gratly started with a simple question from operators: why is something as frequent as tip payouts still so messy? We listened to managers, bartenders, and servers who wanted a fair system that did not slow service.

The result is a platform designed around the rhythm of a real shift. We keep the workflow tight, the payouts clear, and the reporting easy to trust, so hospitality teams can stay focused on people.
